    • Constructor Detail

      • CanvasWrapper

        public CanvasWrapper(java.lang.String icon,
                     java.lang.String title,
                     Position position,
                     Position size)
        Create a new canvas which is by default transparent and acts as an overlay.
        Parameters:
        icon - Resource path to the icon file
        title - Window title
        position - Window position (top-left corner)
        size - Window size (width, height)
